channel.title: Fun pk help
channel.description: [PwnScape Source] Lately i've been working ona FunPk area. It's at Castle Wars. Now it was like fun pk before I started to work on it. It was -52 wilderness and you wouldn't lose you things, aso you couldn't mage. So I went to develop it into a FunPk and etc. I've been using a tutorial. I let it use Mage, I put all deathStage = 2 things and etc etc. Now when I kill a person they don't lose their stuff but they stick on the ground in a death emote just bowing there. They can't move unless I kick them and it resets. I have the !inFunPk() set in every deathStage = 2 (just lke !isInPitGame thing.) I have the toX and toY's set. Though i'm not sure how it'll trigger it correctly since the infunpk is on all the deathstage = 2. But it should work. I then changed my funPk and reset it to isInCastleWars. But it's doign the same thing what;s wrong? Plus also the fightpits work and I set castle wars exactly the same. I don't understand. Please try and help

item.title: Fun pk help
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Indeed it does, but I surely wouldn’t think of giving up at this point. If you happen to come across a solution please contact me through this topic or a PM. Thanks
TUTORIAL LINK:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,355213.0.html

DID I MISS SOMETHING O.o?

EDIT: PROBLEM RESOLVED! If anyone wishes to know, it was because I didn’t remember the ! means not including sort of. So it wouldn’t respawn me because I had !inFunPk. If you don’t understand follow the link. I don’t blame you o.o i’m not a good “explainer”

Read full topic

item.title: Fun pk help
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

[quote=“Valhalla95, post:2, topic:288685”]sounds like you may have a problem

@Fox0wnage "Hello, my name is “SEARCH” i am a button and a text box…want to learn how to use me?[/quote]

You’re so funny. Most people with common sense use the search bar. Which I did. That’s why I finally posted after about 40 Minutes. So since you obviously sound like you know what the problem is you could’ve easily just answered it instead of making a comment that was not much help at all.
And there’s not much of a chance of finding a solution. What should I type? “my guy sticks on the ground in funpk?” If you have a solution as for what to search that’d be nice… [ I’m directly following a tutorial and no errors, so everything is smooth except for something i’m probably missing :)]

item.title: Fun pk help
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

[PwnScape Source]
Lately i’ve been working ona FunPk area. It’s at Castle Wars. Now it was like fun pk before I started to work on it. It was -52 wilderness and you wouldn’t lose you things, aso you couldn’t mage.
So I went to develop it into a FunPk and etc. I’ve been using a tutorial. I let it use Mage, I put all deathStage = 2 things and etc etc.
Now when I kill a person they don’t lose their stuff but they stick on the ground in a death emote just bowing there.
They can’t move unless I kick them and it resets. I have the !inFunPk() set in every deathStage = 2 (just lke !isInPitGame thing.)
I have the toX and toY’s set. Though i’m not sure how it’ll trigger it correctly since the infunpk is on all the deathstage = 2. But it should work.
I then changed my funPk and reset it to isInCastleWars. But it’s doign the same thing what;s wrong? Plus also the fightpits work and I set castle wars exactly the same. I don’t understand. Please try and help

Read full topic
